bibl.title: The Languages of the Legal and Administrative Documents from the Judaean Desert.
bibl.note: Revised version of a paper originally delivered at the conference on Aspects of Bilingualism in the Ancient World, held at Reading University, 2-4 April 1998. - Aramaic, Nabataean and Greek documents (including marriage contracts) from the provinces of Arabia and Judaea, in part. from Wadi Murabba‘at and Nahal Hever.
bibl.seg: COTTON Hannah M., The Languages of the Legal and Administrative Documents from the Judaean Desert.

Revised version of a paper originally delivered at the conference on Aspects of Bilingualism in the Ancient World, held at Reading University, 2-4 April 1998. - Aramaic, Nabataean and Greek documents (including marriage contracts) from the provinces of Arabia and Judaea, in part. from Wadi Murabba‘at and Nahal Hever.
